title: Vase, ca. 1800
markings: Marks: On bottom in underglaze blue: "P:V:M"
provenance: James Cogar, Williamsburg, Va.; Phelps Warren (about 1957)
description: Tall, twisted, fluted 8-sided vase with short flared foot and flaring mouthwith shaped rim; painted in underglaze blue on white with 8 verticle panelseach with flower bottom, alternate mid-sections of landscapes or flowers, top section of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. earthenware, tin glaze. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-30.
